action: I want to search for and filter registered customers using specific conditions
reason: Because I need to quickly access necessary customer information to improve sales efficiency
acceptance_criteria: The system shall allow only authenticated users with valid read permissions to execute customer searches.
The system must deny access to the customer list for users without the appropriate role.
The system shall support partial match search functionality for the Customer Name field.
The system must support searching by Email Address and Phone Number.
The system shall allow filtering of results by geographic fields such as Country and State/Province.
The system must allow filtering by Customer Status (e.g., Active, Dormant, Suspended).
The system shall support the combination of multiple search criteria using logical AND operators.
The system must implement pagination for search results, allowing the client to define the number of items per page (default: 20).
The system must use parameterized queries for all database search operations to prevent SQL injection.
The system shall sanitize all input values to protect against Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks.
The system shall target an API response time of under 500ms for standard search queries.
The system must apply masking rules to sensitive Personally Identifiable Information (PII) in the search results based on configuration.
The system shall dynamically control visible response fields based on the user's role and permissions.
The system must log every search execution, capturing the User ID, search criteria, and timestamp.
The system shall enforce rate limiting on the search API to prevent resource exhaustion.
The search API must adhere to REST architectural principles.
The system must store audit logs in tamper-evident storage to prevent modification.
